Nov. 24, 1979 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Test Piece Contest
Henry V [Maldwyn Price]
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £30, 2nd £20, 3rd £15. 10 bands competed.
